ygData.subject: Re: The GM was taking survey last night.  you need to read this!!!  l ong text.
ygData.msgSnippet: Woohoo!! It could also mean that they are taking data of their own to match with the petition (more of a poll) I sent to Brad McQuaid. In case no bards on this
ygData.messageBody:
Woohoo!! It could also mean that they are taking data of their own to match
with the petition (more of a poll) I sent to Brad McQuaid.

In case no bards on this list got to see it (I'm sure they did) the results
are at:

http://members.tripod.com/sfdguild/results.htm

Nafai

----- Original Message -----
From: CMai <CMai@...>
To: Eqbards (E-mail) <eqbards@onelist.com>; EQ-Rogues (E-mail)
<EQ-Rogues@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 2:44 PM
Subject: [eqbards] The GM was taking survey last night. you need to read
this!!! l ong text.


> Hello Everyone,
>
> I am a Bard and a Rogue. This is the reason why I send this message out
to
> 2 list.
> Last night when we were having network problem, I was still on as my bard
in
> Nfreeport. I was running then suddenly a GM start asking me these survey
> question about the bard.
>
> I do not know if it is a she or a he:
> Do you still like your bard? ( I am at lvl 19 right now)
> My answer: I loved the bard and still does.
>
> What so special about the bard that you like?
> My answer: It is so diversify even though we are not good at any one
thing
> but we can mostly do it
> all at a very low skill.
>
> What do you think of the bard compare to SK, Warriors, Rogue, and Wizards?
> My answer: I do not know about the other class but I have played as a
> rogue. I played as a rogue originally but after reaching lvl 17 I find it
> not as fun anymore. The skill are broken. Nothing to look forward to
> beyond lvl 17 so I created this bard. I was not expecting much. I was
> testing out this class but now I loved it. it takes a lot of patience to
> play a bard well because every song is different and each apply
differently
> in different situation. I still used my lvl 1 and 7 songs.
>
> Would you want to play any of those classes?
> My answer: I said not really. I am having too much fun with my bard.
>
> How does a bard fit into a group?
> My answer: People do not understand what a bard does for group. We can
> heal, buff, debuff, speed, and attack also. But people would rather have
> the 3 most important class first before considering the bard: Warriors
like
> ( Warriors, Monk, Paladin, SK, Rangers), Clerics, Magic class (Magicians,
> wizards, Necromancer)
>
> What is the bard favorite weapon?
> My answer: We do not have a specific weapon. We used what ever is
> available to us. But I would not mind having a special instrument
> implemented.
>
> What extra would you like to see in the bard (Teleportation, some other
> stuff I cannot remember)?
> My answer: I would not mind having bind. It would makes our travel a lot
> easier.
>
> Then the person says thanx and that was it.
> I think this person seek me out because there was a lot of complaint about
> bard after reaching lvl 20. Also that I do /guildsay after I do something
> amazing like kill 2 orc priest at one time with losing only 1/2 of my
health
> "It is good to be a wood elf bard."
>
> I think they (Verant) do care about our opinion.
> To the rogues: Maybe it is taking them a long time to implement what they
> promise. Lets keep our finger cross.
>
> All of these answers are my opinion of the class and experience. I know I
> have very little of it because I am only lvl 19. Only if those mages
would
> stop stealing my kills then maybe I might be able to lvl a little faster.
>
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> Hammerpaw and Samiam
> Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
>
>
>
